item.title: Smart Adaptive Interfaces – AI-Powered Digital Wellbeing
item.description: A browser-based tool that uses Large Language Models to modify web content in real-time, helping users combat digital distractions and dark patterns through adaptive interfaces. Nominated for demonstration at Academic MindTrek 2025 in Tampere, Finland.

item.title: TrustifyAI – AI-Powered Twitter/X Profile Credibility Evaluation
Smart Adaptive Interfaces – AI-Powered Digital Wellbeing
TrustifyAI – Twitter Profile Credibility
item.description: An AI-powered proof-of-concept tool that helps users evaluate and enhance the credibility of their Twitter profiles. Developed as part of HCI research at the University of Oulu, it combines LLM-based recommendations with user studies to explore trust, usability, and adoption.
